Docs.summary: Creates a new prompt that leverage Teams Single Sign On (SSO) support for bot to automatically sign in user and help receive oauth token, asks the user to consent if needed.
Docs.remarks: The prompt will attempt to retrieve the user's current token of the desired scopes. User will be automatically signed in leveraging Teams support of Bot Single Sign On(SSO): https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/platform/bots/how-to/authentication/auth-aad-sso-bots
